name: Theseus in the Dark (Lisa Smedman)
description:
Can you avoid the minotaur and escape the labyrinth? Ariadne has laid out a path for you to follow, but finding the start of the thread isn't going to be easy.

Created for the "Blackout" game jam hosted by The Papercut Arcade (www.thepapercutarcade.ca) using RPG Maker VX Ace.
